verbose_text: The in vitro experiments demonstrated that the PI3K/Akt/p70S6K signaling pathway in rat PAFs was significantly activated by hypoxia (1% O 2), although previous studies have reported that hypoxia triggers the PI3K / mTOR signaling pathway in a cell specific manner, different kinds of cells could show quite different changes of the PI3K / mTOR signaling pathway under hypoxia.
